profile:
Seaway Doors Ltd is a locally owned and operated family business serving Leeds, Grenville and Dundas Counties since 1978. We specialize in the sales, service and installation of overhead garage doors for residential, commercial, agricultural and industrial applications. Garaga Expert members since 1997, the Seaway team has met strict qualifcation criteria and the most stringent installation requierements. 

Proud to offer a quality product "Made in Canada" Bob and Jeff Laushway of Seaway Doors have maintained customer satisfaction for over 30 years. This dedication to service has enabled Seaway Doors - your Garaga Expert - to become a trusted name in the garage door industry. We offer a complete line of sectional garage doors and electric garage door openers as well as many other accessories to go with your garage door. Think of us when it comes to buying, installing or repairing any type of garage door. 

Our employees are ready to give you fast and couteous service. Stop by Seaway Doors showroom, and you will be given complete and accurate information on garage doors, operators and accessories to help you to make the right choice according to your needs.  Our showroom is located at 993 Industrial Road in Prescott and is open Monday to Friday from 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM and Saturday by appointment. 

I invite you to come and visit us, and on behalf of our entire team, I thank you for considering our company. 

Jeff Laushway
Owner
Seaway Doors Ltd.
hours: Monday to Friday from 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM, Saturday by appointment.
